General.Name: Zhejiang Yonghe Refrigerant Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Yonghe Refrigerant Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in research and development, production, and sale of fluorine chemical products. It offers chemical raw materials, fluorocarbon chemical elements, and fluorine-containing polymers materials and their monomers; and fluorite ore, fluorite fine powder, sulfuric acid, calcium carbide, coal, liquid chlorine, chloroform, dichloromethane, chloroform, tetrachloroethylene, methanol, chlorine, carbon tetrachloride, hydrofluoric acid, monochloromethane, calcium chloride, methane chloride, and mixed refrigerants, as well as fluorine salt. The company also engages in transportation and trading businesses. Zhejiang Yonghe Refrigerant Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Quzhou, China.
General.Address: Quzhou Donggang Industrial Park E-025, Quzhou, China, 324000
